articles.title: A Bathing Ape and Human Made's Nigo makes historic debut for Kenzo at Paris Fashion Week - CNA
articles.description: Nigo becomes only the second Asian designer at the head of a European high fashion label, alongside Bally’s Filipino-American Rhuigi Villasenor.
articles.content:
WOOYOUNGMI GOES TO 1920s MOSCOW

articles.title: Asia shares tense as Fed looms, Ukraine a concern - Reuters
articles.description: Asian share markets slipped on Monday as investors braced for a Federal Reserve meeting at which it is expected to confirm it will soon start draining the massive lake of liquidity that has supercharged growth stocks in recent years.
articles.content: SYDNEY, Jan 24 (Reuters) - Asian share markets slipped on Monday as investors braced for a Federal Reserve meeting at which it is expected to confirm it will soon start draining the massive lake of l… [+4099 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: COVID outbreak forces hosts India to be kicked out of Asian Cup - ESPN Australia
articles.description: The Women's Asian Cup was thrown into turmoil when hosts India were kicked out of the tournament after a COVID-19 outbreak on Sunday.
articles.content:
India's opening game vs. Iran, which ended in a draw, has now been declared void. AFC
